SEARCH
Package com.gcu.apartmentx.controllers

Class ApartmentController

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.apartmentx.controllers.ApartmentController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/listings") public class ApartmentController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling apartment-related requests Provides methods for displaying, updating, deleting, and creating apartments

    • listings

      @GetMapping("/getlistings") public String listings(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves all apartments and displays them in the Listings view
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the Listings view name

    • updateApartment

      @PostMapping("/update") public String updateApartment(org.springframework.ui.Model m, @RequestParam int id)
      Retrieves the apartment details based on the provided id and displays the UpdateApartment view
      Parameters:
      m - the model to pass attributes to the view
      id - the id of the apartment to update
      Returns:
      the UpdateApartment view name

    • doUpdate

      @PostMapping("/update/do-update") public String doUpdate(@RequestParam int id, @RequestParam(required=false) String name, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer numBeds, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer numBaths, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer floorSpace, @RequestParam(required=false) Float price, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer quantity, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session, org.springframework.ui.Model m)
      Processes the updates for an apartment based on the provided form data
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the apartment to update
      name - the updated name of the apartment
      numBeds - the updated number of beds
      numBaths - the updated number of baths
      floorSpace - the updated floor space
      price - the updated price
      quantity - the updated quantity
      redirectAttributes - used for adding redirect attributes
      session - the current user session
      m - the model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      redirect to the listings page

    • confirmDeleteApartment

      @PostMapping("/delete") public String confirmDeleteApartment(org.springframework.ui.Model m, @RequestParam int id)
      Displays the ConfirmDeleteApartment view when an apartment is selected for deletion
      Parameters:
      m - the model to pass attributes to the view
      id - the id of the apartment to delete
      Returns:
      the ConfirmDeleteApartment view name

    • doDeleteApartment

      @PostMapping("/delete/do-delete") public String doDeleteApartment(org.springframework.ui.Model m, @RequestParam boolean confirm, @RequestParam("apartmentId") int id, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Confirms the deletion of the selected apartment and deletes it if confirmed
      Parameters:
      m - the model to pass attributes to the view
      confirm - whether the user confirmed the deletion
      id - the id of the apartment to delete
      redirectAttributes - used for adding redirect attributes
      Returns:
      redirect to the listings page

      @GetMapping("/create") public String create()
      Displays the Create view for adding a new apartment

      the Create view name

    • submitProduct

      @PostMapping("/create/submit") public String submitProduct(@ModelAttribute ApartmentModel apartment, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Submits the new apartment details from the form and creates the apartment
      Parameters:
      apartment - the apartment model containing user input
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      redirect to the listings page
